product_name: Banila CoClean it Zero Green Peel Toner Pads
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsBanila Co's Clean it Zero Green Peel Toner Pads are a multi-purpose skin treatment that are clinically proven to help balance and soothe oily/congested skin. Pure cotton pads are soaked in a pore-loving formula for easy use, anytime, anywhere.
details: DetailsBenefitsDermatologist TestedHypoallergenicNon-ComedogenicFeaturesFeatures a blend of LHA and Kale to help gently exfoliate skin while Green Apple soothes, tones, and tighten pores for a clear and congested free complexion.Highly concentrated dual sided toner pads packed with a powerful blend of skin clearing ingredients and exfoliants to gently remove dead skin cells.Unclogs pores while balancing oil production and strengthening your skin's natural barrier.Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesMineral OilArtificial ColoringItem 2625863How To UseCleanse and rinse your face thoroughly before applying. Pull one multi-functional toner pad and gently swipe your face, avoiding eye area. Lightly tap the remaining toner until absorbed. Follow up with the rest of your skincare routine.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Extract, Pantolactone, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Oil, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Barosma Betulina Leaf Extract, PVM/MA Copolymer, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Diospyros Kaki Leaf Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Castanea Crenata (Chestnut) Shell Extract, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Disodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Cleanse and rinse your face thoroughly before applying. Pull one multi-functional toner pad and gently swipe your face, avoiding eye area. Lightly tap the remaining toner until absorbed. Follow up with the rest of your skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I don't usually do reviews...but this is amazing, any time my skin is being strange and wants to break out this clears her out! Doesn't dry out my skin, my skin looks great the next day!

reviews.headline: perfect
reviews.comments: I was given this product in exchange for my honest review. With this cleanser I was able to stop double / triple cleansing my face. It is perfect for removing the everyday oil and grime that builds up on the face. it leaves my face feeling nice and hydrated for the day.

reviews.headline: Great for a quick cleanse or pick me up
reviews.comments: I use these when I'm too lazy to do mh fill face routine. They cleanse well and don't irritate my sensitive (eczema) face. The pads are large and it comes with little tweezer picks so you don't have to dirty the pads. Kinda spendy but would get again.

reviews.headline: Loved this product!!
reviews.comments: This product has become a skincare staple for me, thanks to its gentle exfoliation that leaves my skin feeling soft and radiant without any irritation. The fresh herbal scent and smooth texture enhance the experience, making it both effective and enjoyable to use.

reviews.headline: Toner pads I never knew I needed!
reviews.comments:
Love these toner pads so much. It's convenient that they're already soaked in the product! The pads work really well at exfoliation and I like to use them when I have breakouts coming on or when my skin feels like it needs calming. Haven't tried non-chemical exfoliants before this, but I love them and will definitely continue using. 

gifted by Banila Co

reviews.headline: Gentle & balance my skin
reviews.comments:
This toner pad comes in a super convenient packaging!
The jar is a flip cap (yes, no more screwing open cap with slippery hand), and there's a tiny tweezer that can be placed inside the jar.
The pads are dual-sided and can be easily pulled out with the tweezer.
The exfoliation is gentle and doesn't irritate my skin.
It helps balance my skin and leaves it brighter and more moisturized.
I also notice it calms redness and my breakout clears out faster too.
Gifted by Banila Co

reviews.headline: MY SKIN LOVE'S THIS !!!
reviews.comments: toners are so amazing for your skin this specific one didn't let me down, I love how cooling and refreshing this product feels. My skin looked more hydrated a glowy after a couple of uses.

reviews.headline: I love this!!!
reviews.comments: I love this product.This did not feel like it burned my skin like some do. I felt refreshed and clean after using.

reviews.headline: Great in skincare routine!
reviews.comments: I really like these toner pads - I use it right after I cleanse my makeup and right before I put on my serums. It's really gentle and in order to save more for later, I cut them into smaller squares. Also I just LOVE the banila brand - I also use their cleansing balms. I use this toner pad in the morning and the daytime and it's nice!

reviews.headline: Makes toning so easy & gentle!
reviews.comments: The Banilla Co Clean It Zero Green Peel Toner pad is the best toner pad I've used. I have very oily skin so toning is a necessity for me. I usually get the toner & add it to a cotton pad, but this product simplifies that process. They are presoaked & I love that it includes tweezers to help remove the pads. The actual texture is what really won me over. Most toning pads are too rough & harsh, in my opinion. These are rough enough to slightly exfoliate, but not feel scratchy. The actual formula on the pads effectively clarifies & balanced my skin. I'm having no oily issues on the days I use this product. I'm so happy I've discovered this brand. I see why the K-Beauty craze is alive & well. I'd highly recommend for oily, unbalanced skin.

reviews.headline: gentile and effective!
reviews.comments: The zero green peel toner is just great. My face feels fresh and clean after using it. They are oversized pads (in a rather oversized jar!) which makes them much easier to use that the standard pad size. These pads are good as touch ups between face washes, esp if you have oil skin like me. It takes some of the oil off and leaves your face feeling refreshed and cleaner.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product so much! I highly recommend this.

reviews.headline: Perfect addition to my routine
reviews.comments: I use makeup cloths to remove the makeup from my face after cleansing.  But, I always feel like I need to use a exfoliant or toner afterwards.  I tried the Clean it Zero green peel toner pads and I love how it removed my waterproof eye make-up and left my skin feeling much brighter and smooth.  I have combination skin, but I tend to be more oily, especially at the end of the day.  The toner pad removed my excess oil and didn't dry out my skin.  The packaging is really well designed and includes little tongs to pick up only one toner pad at a time.  Other toner pads that I've tried in the past are hard to pick up and you end up picking up a few and putting the extras back in.  Which then causes them to dry out.  Not a problem with these toner pads.  They never dried out!  Also, after cleaning my face, I used the pads on my elbows.  I don't have really rough elbows, but what does it hurt?!  Clean ingredients and clean skin.  Best clean product I've used in awhile!  Gifted by Banila Co.

reviews.headline: 10/10 Toner Pads
reviews.comments: Clean it Zero never disappoints! This is the 4th product I have ever used from them and it is seriously a 10/10! I include the clean it zero green peel toner pads in my skin routine everyday and it has left my skin brighter and clear!

reviews.headline: Must have in my routine!
reviews.comments: So simple to use yet SO effective. I love using these toner pads after my morning & night face washes. My skin has been feeling extremely moisturized and looks brighter than ever! -gifted by Banila Co

reviews.headline: Skin care
reviews.comments: Product gifted by Banila Co for my honest review, and im so happy i received this product because i absolutely love it and will keep it as part of my skin care routine. I can't wait to see my results, i just know theyre gonna be great. If you're still deciding, just go on ahead get it.

reviews.headline: Game Changer!
reviews.comments:
Gifted by Banila Co -
After using Clean it Zero Green Peel Toner Pads for a week, I'm hooked! These toner pads not only refresh my skin but also provide SPF protection – a game-changer in my routine. The dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic formula feels like a spa treat for my skin. Each pad leaves my face feeling clean, smooth, and protected. K-Beauty lovers, trust me, these are a must-try for that radiant glow!

reviews.headline: Great for Oily skin!
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed using these toner pads. They did such a great job unclogging my pores and tightening them. I also noticed my skin is less oily than usual overall very happy with the results. Gifted by Banilla co

reviews.headline: Great for Oily skin!
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed using these toner pads. They did such a great job unclogging my pores and tightening them. I also noticed my skin is less oily than usual overall very happy with the results. Gifted by Banilla co

reviews.headline: Freshly and clean  skin
reviews.comments: I love the sensation of clean and fresh skin, I added it to my skin care routine a few weeks ago and I can say I noticed a difference, the scent is shooting and mild, the size of the pad is considerably big, with one I can do my whole face and neck, it comes with a little tweezers to grab them and don't contaminate the rest of the pads
